snippet: SoftBank of Japan is nearing a deal to buy control of Sprint Nextel, a person briefed on the matter said on Thursday, giving the struggling American cellphone service provider a deep-pocketed backer to help finance its latest turnaround. Read more »
abstract: SoftBank of Japan is nearing a deal to buy control of Sprint Nextel, a person briefed on the matter said on Thursday, giving the struggling American cellphone service provider a deep-pocketed backer to help finance its latest turnaround. Read more »
lead_paragraph: SoftBank of Japan is nearing a deal to buy control of Sprint Nextel, a person briefed on the matter said on Thursday, giving the struggling American cellphone service provider a deep-pocketed backer to help finance its latest turnaround. Read more »

headline.main: SoftBank of Japan Said to Near Deal for Control of Sprint
